passive.description_source: Warwick's basic attacks deal bonus magic damage. If Warwick is below 50% health, he heals the same amount. If Warwick is below 25% health, this healing triples.
passive.description: Basic attacks deal bonus magic damage scaling with level, bonus AD, and AP. Heal for damage dealt below 50% health (increased below 25%).

effects.context_notes: Damage scales by champion level from 12 to 46.
Heal equals damage dealt below 50% health; increased to 250% below 25%.
effects.description: Heal from passive damage when low health

passive.name: Eternal Hunger

basic_ability_3.name: Primal Howl
basic_ability_3.description_source: Warwick gains damage reduction for 2.5 seconds. At the end, or if re-activated, he howls, causing nearby enemies to flee for 1 second.
basic_ability_3.description: Gain damage reduction for 2.5s, then fear nearby enemies and slow them; can recast after 1s.

basic_ability_2.name: Blood Hunt
basic_ability_2.description_source: Warwick senses enemies below 50% health, gaining Move Speed toward and attack speed against them. When they fall below 25% health, he frenzies and these bonuses triple.
basic_ability_2.context_notes: Passive attack speed applies to targets below 50% health; movement speed applies when following trails toward low-health champions. Active marks nearest enemy champion for 8 seconds.

effects.description: Bonus attack speed vs targets below 50% health
Bonus movement speed toward low-health champions
Increased attack speed vs targets below 25% health
Increased movement speed vs targets below 25% health
Cooldown runs twice as fast when no enemy champions are marked

basic_ability_2.description: Sense low-health enemy champions, granting bonus move speed toward them and bonus attack speed against them; bonuses are increased against targets below 25% health. Active marks the nearest enemy champion for 8s.

basic_ability_1.name: Jaws of the Beast
basic_ability_1.description_source: Warwick lunges forward and bites his target, dealing damage based on their maximum health and healing for damage dealt.
basic_ability_1.context_notes: Range shown as target range 350; ability lunges to target.

effects.description: Magic damage based on target max health

effects.context_notes: Healing is based on post-mitigation damage dealt by Q only.

basic_ability_1.description: Bite a target to deal magic damage based on target max health plus AD/AP scaling and heal for a percent of damage dealt; has a monster damage cap.

ultimate.name: Infinite Duress
ultimate.description_source: Warwick leaps in a direction (scaling with his bonus Move Speed), suppressing the first champion he collides with for 1.5 seconds.
ultimate.context_notes: Range scales with current movement speed (250% movement speed).

effects.context_notes: Heals for 100% of post-mitigation damage dealt to the target during the channel.
effects.description: Heal for damage dealt during R

ultimate.description: Leap to suppress a target for 1.5s, applying on-hit effects three times, dealing total magic damage scaling with bonus AD, and healing for damage dealt.

name: Warwick
notes: Scaling coefficients are not included in Data Dragon spell vars for these files; only base values are represented.
Where leveltip labels exist, base values are mapped into effects with formula terms using base_by_rank.
Scaling coefficients were supplemented from wiki ability data templates where available.
Ability values and scalings for Warwick were verified against the Fandom LoL wiki page.

sources.used_for: base stats, base ability values, cooldowns, costs
ability values, costs, cooldowns, ranges, and scalings
basic attack windup and missile speed

schema_notes.value_percent: A fixed percentage value (stored as percent, not decimal).

basic_attack.windup_percent: Percent of attack period spent in windup.
basic_attack.calculation_notes: Explains how derived values were computed.
basic_attack.missile_speed: Projectile speed for ranged basic attacks (units per second); null for melee.

schema_notes.ratio_type: Defines how a ratio is interpreted relative to the specified resource or stat.

formula.contextual_multipliers: Optional. Used when the result depends on context like target type.
formula.output_stat: The stat produced by this formula (e.g., magic_damage, heal, bonus_health).

terms.source: Optional. References a base array like base_by_rank or base_by_champion_level.
terms.input_stat: Optional. The stat used for scaling (e.g., ability_power, bonus_health).
coefficient_type: per_point: linear scaling per 1 point of input_stat.
percent_of_stat: input_stat * coefficient, where coefficient is a percent as a decimal.
percent_per_100_stat: coefficient applied per 100 of input_stat.
multiplier: used when the input_stat is a value to be multiplied directly (e.g., damage_dealt).

formula.op: Operation applied to all terms. Common: add, multiply.

schema_notes.base_by_champion_level: Array of base values by champion level tiers (as defined by the game).
schema_notes.base_by_rank: Array of base values by ability rank (1-5).
